Title: Relates to imposing special review procedures for approval of development projects in marshlands by the city planning commission
Summary: Requires specific review procedures for approval of development projects in marshlands by the city planning commission including site plans, surveys, environmental review and community hearings and input.
LawCode: Add ยง25-121, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to special review procedures for development in marshlands
